decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings:
Existing and Proposed Site Plans, DWG No. LaVaastu/2024/382/02/ Rev B, dated 24 April 2024
Proposed Floor Plans, DWG No. LaVaastu/2024/382/05/ Rev A, dated 24 April 2024
Proposed Elevations, DWG No. LaVaastu/2024/382/07/ Rev A, dated 24 April 2024
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Other than the balconies identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, no part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Part single and part two storey rear/side extension incorporating Juliet balcony; two storey side extension; front porch extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; and installation of three rooflights to front roofslope (following demolition of existing rear conservatory, side storage and garage)
